entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 01:25 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over eastern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
